title: Part Transfer of Rolling Grant from Cardiff to Preston
abstractText: This proposal has previously been refereed, and is simply a transfer.
impactText: Many other researchers in our field have cited our work. Education,Leisure Activities, including Sports, Recreation and Tourism,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections Cultural
findingsText: We have progessed our knowledge of star formation. Others have already started using our knowledge and citing our papers. Education,Leisure Activities, including Sports, Recreation and Tourism,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections
